comments.creator: hub@figuiere.net
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build Identifier: 

Lot of people send diff as application/octet-stream. I blame Gmail. 
They appear as a MIME part of a multipart/mixed attachment.

Like that:

Content-Type: application/octet-stream; name="foo.diff"
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="foo.diff"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64


I would like to have Thunderbird allow me to view these online in the mail reader. Not necessarily by default. But eventually allow me to do so.

Reproducible: Always
